quote: The chief cause of failure and unhappiness is trading what you want most for what you want right now. – Zig Ziglar
fact: When possums are playing `possum`, they are not "playing." They actually pass out from sheer terror.
joke: What do you get when you cross a bee and a sheep? A bah-humbug.
